alert.note: Alert for Amherst; Bedford; Campbell; Halifax; Pittsylvania; Rockbridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Storms will impact portions of north central Caswell, southeastern Rockbridge, central Campbell, eastern Pittsylvania, northwestern Halifax, eastern Bedford, and western Amherst Counties, the eastern City of Danville, the southeastern City of Buena Vista and the City of Lynchburg through 645 PM EST... At 614 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking storms along a line extending from Bedford to Gretna to Providence. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lynchburg... Danville... Buena Vista... Bedford... Altavista... Yanceyville... and Hurt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Amherst; Bedford; Campbell; Halifax; Pittsylvania; Rockbridge
